imdb.plot outline: The theme of the second year of Nothing More Beautiful is Encountering Anew the Beauty of Christ. From this topic stemmed five enriching encounters contained in this DVD: Jesus Christ: Word of God Made Flesh Catechesis: Most Rev. Richard Smith, Archbishop of Edmonton Witness: Lydia Cristini, teacher Jesus Christ: The Way, the Truth and the Life Catechist: Most Rev. Thomas Collins, Archbishop of Toronto Witness: Mother Agnes Mary Donovan, Superior General, Sisters of Life Jesus Christ: Lamb of God and Bread of Life Catechist: Most Rev. Gary Gordon, Bishop of Whitehorse Witness: Sister Annata Brockman, Sisters of Charity of St. Vincent de Paul Jesus Christ: Crucified and Risen Lord Catechist: Most Rev. J. Michael Miller, CSB, Archbishop of Vancouver Witness: George Weigel, author Jesus Christ: Revelation of the Trinity Catechist: Cardinal Marc Ouellet, Archbishop of Quebec Witness: Carl Anderson, Supreme Knight, Knights of Columbus Each 55 to 85 minute program includes both talks as well as a small segment of Vespers from each event. To help the viewer better consider the content of each encounter, this DVD also includes a 7-10 minute Catechetical Focus by Archbishop Richard Smith for each Nothing More Beautiful episode.
imdb.title: Nothing More Beautiful: Encountering Anew the Beauty of Christ
akas: Nothing More Beautiful: Encountering Anew the Beauty of Christ (Canada)
